page.title: 18Local Organisations.
page.content: The people of Crawford are very well provided for with various clubs and organisations. For girls,aged 7 years to 14 years, there are Brownies and Guides.For boys aged 8 years to 11 years,there are the Cubs.Unfortunately there is no Scout Troop. The Youth Club is for teenagers.At their meetings they play table tennis,darts and pool. For the ladies there is the W.R.I. which meets monthly.There is also a Lifeboat Guild which holds an annual sale of work. Associated with the Church there is the Women's Guild and the Sunday School.
